parameters.query: SELECT id, name, status FROM projects WHERE id = '{{ $json.project_id }}'::uuid AND status = 'active'

INSERT INTO evidence (
  project_id,
  minio_bucket,
  minio_path,
  file_name,
  file_hash_sha256,
  file_size_bytes,
  file_type,
  mime_type,
  parser_status,
  metadata
) VALUES (
  '{{ $json.project_id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $json.minio_bucket }}',
  '{{ $json.minio_path }}',
  '{{ $json.file_name }}',
  '{{ $json.file_hash }}',
  {{ $json.file_size }},
  '{{ $json.file_type }}',
  '{{ $json.mime_type }}',
  'pending',
  '{{ JSON.stringify($json.metadata) }}'::jsonb
)
RETURNING id, created_at

INSERT INTO scan_jobs (
  project_id,
  job_type,
  status,
  target,
  metadata
) VALUES (
  '{{ $json.project_id }}'::uuid,
  'parse',
  'queued',
  '{{ $json.file_name }}',
  '{{ JSON.stringify({ evidence_id: $json.evidence_id, file_type: $json.file_type, minio_path: $json.minio_path }) }}'::jsonb
)
RETURNING id

INSERT INTO audit_log (project_id, action, entity_type, entity_id, details)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.project_id }}'::uuid,
  'evidence_uploaded',
  'evidence',
  '{{ $json.evidence_id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ JSON.stringify({ file_name: $json.file_name, file_type: $json.file_type, file_hash: $json.file_hash }) }}'
)

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: true, evidence_id: $('Check Parser').first().json.evidence_id, file_name: $('Check Parser').first().json.file_name, file_hash: $('Check Parser').first().json.file_hash, queued_for_parsing: $('Check Parser').first().json.needs_parsing, message: 'Evidence uploaded successfully' }) }}
